application.doc: Importing a file to the API Access Control documentation root

param.name: instance_name
param.doc: The name of the Reverse Proxy Instance.

method.name: POST
method.id: Importing a file to the API Access Control documentation root.
method.doc: To import a file to the API Access Control documentation root with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the API Access Control documentation URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: file
param.doc: The actual file to import as an octet stream.

response.doc: 200 ok Note: For the changes to take effect, they must be deployed as described in Configuration changes commit process.
There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
